problemStatement.formal: Let f(N) = sSup { m : ℕ | ∃ A : Finset ℕ, A ⊆ range (N+1) ∧ hasSquarefreeSumset A ∧ A.card = m }. Estimate f(N).
problemStatement.plain: Let f(N) be the size of the largest subset A ⊆ {1,...,N} such that every element of A+A is squarefree. Current bounds: (log log N)(log N)² ≪ f(N) ≪ N^{11/15+o(1)}. Is f(N) polylogarithmic?
whyMatters: Connects additive combinatorics with multiplicative number theory
Tests how squarefree constraint limits sumset structure
